title: Oatmello - Light in the Window
description:
Official Animated Music Video for 'Light in the Window' by Oatmello

Over a year in the making, Soft Landing is a dynamic and personal collection from Eugene, Oregon based producer Oatmello. Unafraid of open space and mellow tones, these 7 songs dance and play around soft piano and guitar lines that take flight; elated and free. 

Soft Landing is presented on a Limited Edition White Vinyl, paired alongside a previous EP Between Us. The Vinyl features the brilliant artwork from Baby Eyez, with a printed inner sleeve with a comic layout of the still frames from the accompanying animation for "Light in the Window".

description:

👉 Subscribe To Sony Music India YouTube - http://bit.ly/SonyMusic_YouTube

title: RADWIMPS - Zen Zen Zense (前前前世) x Kimi no Na wa | but it's lofi hip hop cover
description:
Here is my latest but it’s lofi hip hop cover of RADWIMPS – Zen Zen Zense 前前前世, the theme song  from one of my all-time favorite anime movies Kimi no Na wa or also known as Your Name (君の名は) from Makoto Shinkai, that tells the story of Taki Tachibana, a high school boy in Tokyo and Mitsuha Miyamizu, a high school girl in the Japanese countryside who suddenly and inexplicably begin to swap bodies. 

I went the extra mile this time and added the lyrics in Japanese and English so that you can sing along when you feel like it, just like a karaoke version.

Known for his anime music remixes and previously a major release with Lofi Girl (also known under chilledcow), Kayou. touches everyone with his emotional lo fi music but also manages to create chill music for studying and calming lofi music at the same time.

title: The Promised Neverland - Isabella's Lullaby (Kayou. Remix) Feat. Mewsic
description:
Finally I can show you my new The Promised Neverland - Isabella's Lullaby remix with the breathtaking Mewsic on the vocals. 😃
Thank you all for the submissions and I hope you like the remix ❤️

If you enjoy my music and want to help me, please share it with your friends, on Instagram, Reddit, Facebook, etc. and subscribe for weekly updates! Kayoufam 🔥🔥🔥

🎤Lyrics:
Now close your eyes, and sleep so tight
Dream of happy days
And when you awaken, you'll see a light 
That's shining so bright, like the sun's tender rays

Close your eyes, no need to see
Rest your mind in peace 
I will hold you so tight to me 
And I hope that you'll dream of your days, carefree 

Oh my dear children, I love you and I'll keep you safe
I'll hold you close so you'll never know pain 
Because my children, this world can be cruel and so cold
But a flower can bloom with the thorns 

Oh my dear children, I love you and I hope you see
No matter what comes or when you must leave
That I still love you, and hope that you're happy today
I pray, and I pray, that you'll remember…

Here is the latest Anime Lofi Remix from the Naruto Shippuden Opening 16 Silhouette by KANA-BOON by Kayou.
